title: Subchapter E - Miscellaneous Supreme And County Court Forms
content:
Subchapter E - Miscellaneous Supreme And County Court Forms

State Regulations

Form UCS-840 - Request for judicial intervention

Form UCS-840P - Partition Request for Judicial Intervention Addendum

Form UCS-854 - Uniform sentence and commitment

Petition for order terminating or severing lease or rental agreement

Order on petition pursuant to RPL Section 227-c for termination or severance of lease or rental agreement

Authorization to permit interview of treating physician by defense counsel

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
